grouped-region.name: National: Grouped by Regions
grouped-region.description: (Recommended) Boxes will be organized grouped by the Species and Forms discovered on every region, with the species placed before all the region's forms. This is the default one for HOME, since it does not shift or alter the order of other Pok√©mon whenever a new form or species are introduced.

species-first.name: National: Grouped by Species, then Forms
species-first.description: Grouped with the Species first and the Forms after all of them, grouped by generation and categories. You may need to alter the order of your form boxes if there are a lot of species introduced in a new game. This mode also adds many duplicated Pok√©mon, to visualize all the forms together, including the base form.

sorted-species.name: National: Sorted by Species
sorted-species.description: (Recommended) Pok√©mon Boxes are sorted following HOME's National Dex order, separating Species and Forms. First you will find all the species, then all the forms starting in a new box (leaving a gap with the species).

sorted-species-minimal.name: National: Sorted by Species (Minimal)
sorted-species-minimal.description: Pok√©mon Boxes are sorted following HOME's National Dex order separating Species and Forms, but Legendary or Mythical Pok√©mon forms (like Magearna Original Color, etc) will be excluded. First you will find all the species, then all the forms starting in a new box (leaving a gap with the species).

fully-sorted.name: National: Sorted by Forms
fully-sorted.description: Pok√©mon Boxes are sorted following HOME's National Dex order, mixing Species and Forms together.

fully-sorted-minimal.name: National: Sorted by Forms (Minimal)
fully-sorted-minimal.description: Pok√©mon Boxes are sorted following HOME's National Dex order mixing Species and Forms, but Legendary or Mythical Pok√©mon forms (like Hoopa Unbound, etc) will be excluded.

fully-sorted-minimal.name: Regional: Sorted by Forms, Minimal
fully-sorted-minimal.description: Pok√©mon Boxes are sorted by Species and Forms together (except legendary forms), following original Legends: Arceus Pok√©dex order.

sorted-species.name: Regional: Sorted by Species, then forms
sorted-species.description: Pok√©mon Boxes are grouped separating Species and Forms. First you will find all the species, then all the forms (leaving a gap with the species).

grouped.name: Regional: Sorted by Species, then form groups
grouped.description: Pok√©mon Boxes are grouped separating Species and Forms. First you will find all the species, then all the forms by groups (leaving gaps among different form categories).

fully-sorted.name: Regional: Sorted by Forms
fully-sorted.description: (Recommended) Pok√©mon Boxes are sorted by Species and Forms together, following original Legends: Arceus Pok√©dex order.

fully-sorted-regional.name: Regional: Sorted by Forms
fully-sorted-regional.description: Pok√©mon Boxes are sorted by Species and Forms together. Pok√©mon are sorted following each different Galar Pokedexes keeping only non-duplicates entries from DLCs.

sorted-regional.name: Regional: Sorted by Species
sorted-regional.description: Pok√©mon Boxes are sorted following each different Galar Pokedexes keeping only non-duplicates entries, separating Species and Forms. First you will find all the species, then all the forms starting in a new box (leaving a gap with the species)
